townsfolk.name: Acrobat
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are or become drunk or poisoned tonight, you die.

townsfolk.name: Alchemist
townsfolk.ability: You have a Minion ability. When using this, the Storyteller may prompt you to choose differently.

townsfolk.name: Alsaahir
townsfolk.ability: Each day, if you publicly guess which players are Minion(s) and which are Demon(s), good wins.

townsfolk.name: Amnesiac
townsfolk.ability: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.

townsfolk.name: Artist
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.

townsfolk.name: Atheist
townsfolk.ability: The Storyteller can break the game rules, and if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]

townsfolk.name: Balloonist
townsfolk.ability: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

townsfolk.name: Banshee
townsfolk.ability: If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.

townsfolk.name: Bounty Hunter
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]

townsfolk.name: Cannibal
townsfolk.ability: You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.

townsfolk.name: Chambermaid
townsfolk.ability: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.

townsfolk.name: Chef
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

townsfolk.name: Choirboy
townsfolk.ability: If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+the King]

townsfolk.name: Clockmaker
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.

townsfolk.name: Courtier
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.

townsfolk.name: Cult Leader
townsfolk.ability: Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbor. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.

townsfolk.name: Dreamer
townsfolk.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good & 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.

townsfolk.name: Empath
townsfolk.ability: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

townsfolk.name: Engineer
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.

townsfolk.name: Exorcist
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

townsfolk.name: Farmer
townsfolk.ability: When you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.

townsfolk.name: Fisherman
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help your team win.

townsfolk.name: Flowergirl
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.

townsfolk.name: Fool
townsfolk.ability: The 1st time you die, you don't.

townsfolk.name: Fortune Teller
townsfolk.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

townsfolk.name: Gambler
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.

townsfolk.name: General
townsfolk.ability: Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.

townsfolk.name: Gossip
townsfolk.ability: Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.

townsfolk.name: Grandmother
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.

townsfolk.name: High Priestess
townsfolk.ability: Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.

townsfolk.name: Huntsman
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]

townsfolk.name: Innkeeper
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.

townsfolk.name: Investigator
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

townsfolk.name: Juggler
townsfolk.ability: On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.

townsfolk.name: King
townsfolk.ability: Each night, if the dead equal or outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows you are the King.

townsfolk.name: Knight
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.

townsfolk.name: Librarian
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

townsfolk.name: Lycanthrope
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, choose an alive player. If good, they die & the Demon doesn’t kill tonight. One good player registers as evil.

townsfolk.name: Magician
townsfolk.ability: The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.

townsfolk.name: Mathematician
townsfolk.ability: Each night, you learn how many players’ abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.

townsfolk.name: Mayor
townsfolk.ability: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

townsfolk.name: Minstrel
townsfolk.ability: When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.

townsfolk.name: Monk
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

townsfolk.name: Nightwatchman
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn you are the Nightwatchman.

townsfolk.name: Noble
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.

townsfolk.name: Oracle
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.

townsfolk.name: Pacifist
townsfolk.ability: Executed good players might not die.

townsfolk.name: Philosopher
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.

townsfolk.name: Pixie
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.

townsfolk.name: Poppy Grower
townsfolk.ability: Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.

townsfolk.name: Preacher
townsfolk.ability: Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.

townsfolk.name: Princess
townsfolk.ability: On your 1st day, if you nominated & executed a player, the Demon doesn't kill tonight.

townsfolk.name: Professor
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.

townsfolk.name: Ravenkeeper
townsfolk.ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

townsfolk.name: Sage
townsfolk.ability: If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.

townsfolk.name: Sailor
townsfolk.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.

townsfolk.name: Savant
townsfolk.ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.

townsfolk.name: Seamstress
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.

townsfolk.name: Shugenja
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.

townsfolk.name: Slayer
townsfolk.ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

townsfolk.name: Snake Charmer
townsfolk.ability: Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.

townsfolk.name: Soldier
townsfolk.ability: You are safe from the Demon.

townsfolk.name: Steward
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing 1 good player.

townsfolk.name: Tea Lady
townsfolk.ability: If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.

townsfolk.name: Town Crier
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.

townsfolk.name: Undertaker
townsfolk.ability: Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.

townsfolk.name: Village Idiot
townsfolk.ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

townsfolk.name: Virgin
townsfolk.ability: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

townsfolk.name: Washerwoman
townsfolk.ability: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

outsider.name: Barber
outsider.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.

outsider.name: Butler
outsider.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

outsider.name: Damsel
outsider.ability: All Minions know a Damsel is in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.

outsider.name: Drunk
outsider.ability: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

outsider.name: Golem
outsider.ability: You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.

outsider.name: Goon
outsider.ability: Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.

outsider.name: Hatter
outsider.ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

outsider.name: Heretic
outsider.ability: Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.

outsider.name: Hermit
outsider.ability: You have all Outsider abilities. [-0 or -1 Outsider]

outsider.name: Klutz
outsider.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.

outsider.name: Lunatic
outsider.ability: You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.

outsider.name: Moonchild
outsider.ability: When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.

outsider.name: Mutant
outsider.ability: If you are “mad” about being an Outsider, you might be executed.

outsider.name: Ogre
outsider.ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

outsider.name: Plague Doctor
outsider.ability: When you die, the Storyteller gains a Minion ability.

outsider.name: Politician
outsider.ability: If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.

outsider.name: Puzzlemaster
outsider.ability: 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.

outsider.name: Recluse
outsider.ability: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

outsider.name: Saint
outsider.ability: If you die by execution, your team loses.

outsider.name: Snitch
outsider.ability: Each Minion gets 3 bluffs.

outsider.name: Sweetheart
outsider.ability: When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.

outsider.name: Tinker
outsider.ability: You might die at any time.

outsider.name: Zealot
outsider.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive, you must vote for every nomination.

minion.name: Assassin
minion.ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.

minion.name: Baron
minion.ability: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

minion.name: Boffin
minion.ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character’s ability. You both know which.

minion.name: Boomdandy
minion.ability: If you are executed, all but 3 players die. After a 10 to 1 countdown, the player with the most players pointing at them, dies.

minion.name: Cerenovus
minion.ability: Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are “mad” they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.

minion.name: Devil's Advocate
minion.ability: Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.

minion.name: Evil Twin
minion.ability: You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.

minion.name: Fearmonger
minion.ability: Each night, choose a player: if you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.

minion.name: Goblin
minion.ability: If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.

minion.name: Godfather
minion.ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]

minion.name: Harpy
minion.ability: Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or one or both might die.

minion.name: Marionette
minion.ability: You think you are a good character, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbor the Demon]

minion.name: Mastermind
minion.ability: If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.

minion.name: Mezepheles
minion.ability: You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.

minion.name: Organ Grinder
minion.ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Each night, choose if you are drunk until dusk.

minion.name: Pit-Hag
minion.ability: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not in play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

minion.name: Poisoner
minion.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

minion.name: Psychopath
minion.ability: Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.

minion.name: Scarlet Woman
minion.ability: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)

minion.name: Spy
minion.ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

minion.name: Summoner
minion.ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

minion.name: Vizier
minion.ability: All players know you are the Vizier. You cannot die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

minion.name: Widow
minion.ability: On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire & choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.

minion.name: Witch
minion.ability: Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.

minion.name: Wizard
minion.ability: Once per game, choose to make a wish. If granted, it might have a price & leave a clue as to its nature.

minion.name: Wraith
minion.ability: You may choose to open your eyes at night. You wake when other evil players do.

minion.name: Xaan
minion.ability: On night X, all Townsfolk are poisoned until dusk. [X Outsiders]

demon.name: Al-Hadikhia
demon.ability: Each night*, you may choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.

demon.name: Fang Gu
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]

demon.name: Imp
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.

demon.name: Kazali
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are which Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]

demon.name: Legion
demon.ability: Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]

demon.name: Leviathan
demon.ability: If more than 1 good player is executed, evil wins. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.

demon.name: Lil' Monsta
demon.ability: Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta & "is the Demon". Each night*, a player might die. [+1 Minion]

demon.name: Lleech
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing a player: they are poisoned. You die if & only if they are dead.

demon.name: Lord of Typhon
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [Evil characters are in a line. You are in the middle. +1 Minion. -? to +? Outsiders]

demon.name: No Dashii
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned.

demon.name: Ojo
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.

demon.name: Po
demon.ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.

demon.name: Pukka
demon.ability: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.

demon.name: Riot
demon.ability: On day 3, Minions become Riot & nominees die but nominate an alive player immediately. This must happen.

demon.name: Shabaloth
demon.ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.

demon.name: Vigormortis
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 Outsider]

demon.name: Vortox
demon.ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.

demon.name: Yaggababble
demon.ability: You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.

demon.name: Zombuul
demon.ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.

fabled.name: Angel
fabled.ability: Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.

fabled.name: Bootlegger
fabled.ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

fabled.name: Buddhist
fabled.ability: For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.

fabled.name: Deus ex Fiasco
fabled.ability: At least once per game, the Storyteller will make a mistake, correct it, and publicly admit to it

fabled.name: Djinn
fabled.ability: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.

fabled.name: Doomsayer
fabled.ability: If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.

fabled.name: Duchess
fabled.ability: Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.

fabled.name: Ferryman
fabled.ability: On the final day, all dead players regain their vote token.

fabled.name: Fibbin
fabled.ability: Once per game, 1 good player might get incorrect information.

fabled.name: Fiddler
fabled.ability: Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses an opposing player: all players choose which of these 2 players win.

fabled.name: Gardener
fabled.ability: The Storyteller assigns 1 or more players' characters.

fabled.name: Hell's Librarian
fabled.ability: Something bad might happen to whoever talks when the Storyteller has asked for silence.

fabled.name: Revolutionary
fabled.ability: 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, 1 of them registers falsely.

fabled.name: Sentinel
fabled.ability: There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.

fabled.name: Spirit of Ivory
fabled.ability: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.

fabled.name: Storm Catcher
fabled.ability: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.

fabled.name: Toymaker
fabled.ability: The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.

travellers.name: Beggar
travellers.ability: You must use a vote token to vote. If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn their alignment. You are sober & healthy.

travellers.name: Bureaucrat
travellers.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.

travellers.name: Gunslinger
travellers.ability: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.

travellers.name: Scapegoat
travellers.ability: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.

travellers.name: Thief
travellers.ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
